messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Atention crew we are going to be experementing with xenomorphsss they may be docile they may be dead but non the lesss sssaftey messsuresss are asss followsss: wear a masssk at all timesss and all resssearch ssstaff are to be  treated asss 2nd in comand if a breakout ensssuesss resssearch ssstaff may have weaponsss drawn at all timesss if a breakout occursss and if sssuch doesss hapen hide in lockersss or sssome ssshit i will essstablisssh asss we go but the sssafe haven will probably be sssec

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in verry fucked station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near verry fucked station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: To all crew your lovely cap has xeno organs aswell as her normal organs so she can see people only tru walls and i can shit weeds altho il probably never use that it streches the ass anyway  im still your cap and if anyone is runing around with a chainsaw you have my permision to slap them and if they slap you back they will be slapped by the whole station

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The captain is negotiating with the xenos, please do not hurt them.
